label: 追加法
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: supplementary laws, statutes added to Kamakura shogunal law after the promulgation of the Jōei Formulary (Goseibai shikimoku) in 1232
